metadata.title: DPM Dar telephones Bangladesh Foreign Advisor, reiterates commitment for future cooperation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 9 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Wednesday held a phone call with Adviser for Foreign Affairs of the Peopleas Republic of Bangladesh, Md. Touhid Hossain. The two leaders exchanged Eid greetings, discussed areas of mutual interest, and reiterated their commitment for future engagements and cooperation.
